text: 2019 FIFA U-17 World Cup was held in Brazil from 26 October to 17 November. == Qualified teams == A total of 24 teams qualified for the final tournament. Brazil as host team along with 23 other teams qualified from six separate continental competitions. The slot allocation was approved by the FIFA Council on 10 June 2018. Confederation Qualifying tournament Team Appearance Last appearance Previous best performance AFC 2018 AFC U-16 Championship 13th 2015 (1999) 9th 2017 (1993, 2011) 6th 2015 (1987, 2009) 2nd 2007 (2007) CAF 2019 Africa U-17 Cup of Nations 2nd 2003 (2003) 12th 2015 (1985, 1993, 2007, 2013, 2015) 1st N/A 1st N/A CONCACAF 2019 CONCACAF U-17 Championship 7th 2013 (1987, 1989, 1993, 1995, 2011, 2013) 17th 2017 (1999) 14th 2017 (2005, 2011) 2nd 2007 (2007) CONMEBOL Host nation 17th 2017 (1997, 1999, 2003) 2019 South American U-17 Championship 14th 2015 (1991, 1995, 2003) 5th 2017 (1993) 5th 2015 (1995, 2015) 5th 2017 (1999) OFC 2018 OFC U-16 Championship 9th 2017 (2009, 2011, 2015) 1st N/A UEFA 2019 UEFA European Under-17 Championship 7th 2017 (2001) 4th 2011 (2005) 8th 2013 (1987) 10th 2017 (1991, 2003, 2007, 2017) 2nd 1985 (1985) ;Notes == Venues == The tournament used four venues in three cities. Goiânia Estádio da Serrinha Estádio Olímpico Capacity: 9,900 Capacity: 13,500 Gama Cariacica Estádio Bezerrão Estádio Kléber Andrade Capacity: 20,310 Capacity: 21,000 ==Results== RSSSF ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 9 1 +8 9 align=left 3 2 0 1 4 4 0 6 align=left 3 1 0 2 2 5 -3 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 2 7 -5 0 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 0 1 8 6 +2 6 align=left 3 2 0 1 7 6 +1 6 align=left 3 1 1 1 5 5 0 4 align=left 3 0 1 2 6 9 -3 1 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 7 1 +6 9 align=left 3 2 0 1 5 5 0 6 align=left 3 1 0 2 5 6 -1 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 3 8 -5 0 ====Group D==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 4 0 +4 7 align=left 3 2 0 1 7 3 +4 6 align=left 3 1 0 2 5 6 -1 3 align=left 3 0 1 2 1 8 -7 1 ====Group E==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 7 1 +6 7 align=left 3 2 1 0 6 2 +4 7 align=left 3 1 0 2 3 8 -5 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 1 6 -5 0 ====Group F==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 9 1 +8 7 align=left 3 2 0 1 8 3 +5 6 align=left 3 1 1 1 9 2 +7 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 0 20 -20 0 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round16 |||0||1 |||0||2 |||1||3 |||3||2 |||2||1 |||4||0 |||0||1 |||3||2 |||0||1 |||4||1 |||1||6 |||0||2 |||1(4)||1(3) |||2||3 |||1||2 |||1||3 |widescore=yes}} ==References== Category:FIFA U-17 World Cup Category:2019 in association football Category:2019 in Brazil Category:Football in Brazil Category:October 2019 events Category:November 2019 events
